name: Starda
description: In this game you just have to dodge the lightning bugs. Sloculi is a feature on your space ship that will slow time. I know it is very buggy, I plan on fixing a lot of them and fixing sloculi, I just wanted to submit the project on time for Secret Santa. My first bug to fix will be to see your space ship, you're there, I promise. Your hull points are displayed in the bottom left hand corner.
